name: Eternal Rose Crystal
description: A stunning crystal rose preserved forever, symbolizing eternal love. Each petal is carefully crafted to capture the beauty of a real rose in everlasting crystal.

name: Heart Locket Necklace
description: A delicate gold-plated heart locket that holds two tiny photos. Keep your loved one close to your heart wherever you go.

name: Luxury Chocolate Box
description: An exquisite collection of 24 handcrafted Belgian chocolates in a velvet heart-shaped box. Each piece is a masterpiece of flavor.

name: Couple's Spa Set
description: A luxurious spa gift set for two, including aromatic candles, bath bombs, essential oils, and matching robes for the perfect relaxation night.

name: Personalized Star Map
description: A custom star map showing the exact night sky from any special date and location. Frame the stars that witnessed your love story.

name: Red Rose Bouquet (50 Roses)
description: Fifty premium long-stem red roses arranged in an elegant bouquet with baby's breath and greenery. The ultimate romantic gesture.

name: Love Letter Writing Kit
description: Vintage-inspired stationery set with handmade paper, wax seal, calligraphy pen, and romantic stamps. Write letters that become treasured keepsakes.

name: Diamond Heart Earrings
description: Stunning heart-shaped earrings set with genuine diamonds in 14k white gold. Sparkle and elegance in every reflection.

name: Romantic Dinner Cruise
description: A sunset dinner cruise for two with gourmet dining, live music, and champagne. Watch the city lights reflect on the water.

name: Teddy Bear with Heart
description: An adorable oversized plush teddy bear holding a red satin heart with 'I Love You' embroidered in gold thread.

name: Couple's Photo Album
description: A beautifully bound leather photo album with 'Our Love Story' embossed in gold. Includes 100 acid-free pages for your memories.

name: Rose Gold Bracelet
description: An elegant rose gold chain bracelet with a small heart charm engraved with your initials. Adjustable clasp for the perfect fit.

name: Scented Candle Collection
description: Set of five luxury soy candles in romantic scents: Rose Garden, Vanilla Dream, Jasmine Night, Lavender Bliss, and Amber Passion.

name: Hot Air Balloon Experience
description: A breathtaking sunrise hot air balloon ride for two with champagne toast and professional photography included.

name: Preserved Flower Heart Box
description: Real roses preserved to last over a year, arranged in a heart-shaped velvet box. Available in red, pink, and lavender.

name: Couple's Matching Rings
description: A set of matching sterling silver promise rings with interlocking heart design. When placed together, they form a complete heart.

name: Artisan Strawberry Box
description: A dozen premium strawberries dipped in Belgian chocolate with decorations of white chocolate, sprinkles, and edible gold dust.

name: Infinity Rose Lamp
description: An enchanted rose inside a glass dome with warm LED fairy lights. Inspired by timeless fairy tales of everlasting love.
